comments.content: [Atelier Nicolas Perrotet](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415102054/http:/nicolasperrottet.ch/) website uses a bespoke typeface called ' [Rural](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415102054/http:/nicolasperrottet.ch/content/about)' and designed by [Joel Passieux](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415102054/http:/www.joelpassieux.com/)
I’m sure Eric Gill think it’s highly original.

What Frode means is that this looks like yet another version of the typeface created by Gill as a guide for the sign-painters of W.H. Smith & Son shops, AKA Gill Facia:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/120696](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415102054/http:/typophile.com/node/120696 "http://typophile.com/node/120696")  
 [http://typophile.com/node/100875](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415102054/http:/typophile.com/node/100875 "http://typophile.com/node/100875")
